Source.Name: gpgme
Source.Summary: language library in C for cryptography support
Source.Description: GPGME (GnuPG Made Easy) is a C language library that allows to add support for cryptography to a program. It is designed to make access to public key crypto engines like GnuPG or GpgSM easier for applications. GPGME provides a high-level crypto API for encryption, decryption, signing, signature verification and key management.
